headline: Forter Partners with Global QSR Leader to Advance Digital Fraud Prevention
summary: Today, Forter, the Trust Platform for digital commerce, announced a global partnership with McDonald's to deliver fraud prevention and identity solutions across the quick service restaurant (QSR) leader's digital ecosystem.

raw.headline: Forter Partners with Global QSR Leader to Advance Digital Fraud Prevention
raw.summary: Today, Forter, the Trust Platform for digital commerce, announced a global partnership with McDonald's to deliver fraud prevention and identity solutions across the quick service restaurant (QSR) leader's digital ecosystem.

headline: KeyBanc Sees Strong U.S. Quarter for McDonald’s (MCD) Amid Choppy Industry Backdrop
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is included among the 15 Best S&P 500 Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 9, KeyBanc analyst Eric Gonzalez raised McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) price target to $340 from $335 and maintained an Overweight rating on the stock. KeyBanc said Q4 2025 looked like a strong quarter for McDonald’s US. The […]

headline: 2 Profitable Stocks Worth Investigating and 1 That Underwhelm
summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".

raw.headline: 2 Profitable Stocks Worth Investigating and 1 That Underwhelm
raw.summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".

headline: McDonald's (MCD) Valuation Check As Nostalgia And Value Marketing Campaigns Seek To Reinforce Customer Engagement
summary: McDonald's (MCD) is leaning on nostalgia and sharper value messaging by reviving its fan requested Changeables Happy Meal toys while rolling out limited time menu items and price focused deals to keep cost conscious diners engaged. See our latest analysis for McDonald's. Those nostalgia and value moves come as McDonald’s shares trade at US$312.95, with a 3.2% year to date share price return and a 9.3% one year total shareholder return. This points to steady rather than surging momentum as new...

headline: Domino's follows McDonald's menu plan, adds bigger deals
summary: Fast-food chains have been fighting a value perception issue and have embraced deals in order to win over cost-conscious customers. Customers have become wary of prices because prices have been going up. Prices for food away from home have climbed 27.2% since June 2019, according to data from the ...
